name: Castle battle 3D
description:
Try to destroy these 21 castles with your mighty cannon and kill the soldiers guarding it. This is a physics based game where you shoot your cannon and destroy structures made out of bricks.

My very first completed project, hope you enjoy it at least a little bit and see you next time with something hopefully much much better :)

takes about 15 minutes to complete.

Controls:
mouse to aim and shoot, V to change camera view, R to reload the level, P to pause the game, S to slow down time, F to reset the time to normal
